Name: Holy Slingshot
Description: Sling a series of glory-filled grenades at the monster. A direct hit will stick the grenade to the monster and cause continuous damage. Otherwise the grenade lands as holy ground with a 2.2 meter radius lasting 5 seconds that purifies any monster within.

Misc.ToolTip: The base crafting time of the Holy Slingshot
The base amount of shots given to you when crafting the Holy Slingshot.
The radius of the holy ground created by a shot when hitting the environment.
The base duration of the holy ground on the Holy Slingshot.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Holy Slingshot in order to wound or stun the monster.
The maximum amount of time a shot from the Holy Slingshot may be airborne.
The base amount of time one has to wait before firing a subsequent shot of the Holy Slingshot.
The default amount of time it takes for the Holy Slingshot to warm up initially when trying to fire a shot.
The default speed at which a shot from the Holy Slingshot fires.
The movement speed multiplier applied to teens when aiming the Holy Slingshot.
The movement speed multiplier applied to the monster while being damaged by a Holy Slingshot's holy ground.
The radius of the shot projectile from the Holy Slingshot. This may be incorrect!

WeaponMods.Name: Stunning Praise
WeaponMods.Description:
+ If the monster is Stunned by the Holy Slingshot, the time the monster is Stunned is increased by 25%.
- If the monster is Wounded by the Holy Slingshot, the time the monster is Banished is decreased by 25%.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus stun time multiplier applied to the monster's base stun time Stunned by a Holy Slingshot running Stunning Praise.
The penalty multiplier applied to the monster's base banished time when Wounded by a Holy Slingshot running Stunning Praise.

WeaponMods.Name: Go For Glory
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The weapon ammunition of the Holy Slingshot is increased by 1.
- Grenades will pass through the monster when they hit, rather than stick.

Misc.ToolTip: The number of extra shots provided to a Holy Slingshot running Go For Glory.

WeaponMods.Name: Devoted One
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The crafting time of the Holy Slingshot is reduced by 20%.
- The ammunition available to the Holy Slingshot is decreased by 1.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the crafting time of the Holy Slingshot when running Devoted One.
The amount of shots removed from the total shot count on a Holy Slingshot running Devoted One.

WeaponMods.Name: Blind Faith
WeaponMods.Description:
+ When the Holy Slingshot deals damage to the monster, they will also be Blinded for 1.5 seconds, unable to see teens or weapons.
- The crafting time of the Holy Slingshot is increased by 20%.

Misc.ToolTip: The blind duration applied to the monster when being damaged by a Holy Slingshot running Blind Faith.
The crafting time penalty multiplier applied to the Holy Slingshot when running Blind Faith.

WeaponMods.Name: Higher Power
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The weapon ammunition of the Holy Slingshot is increased by 1.
- Your grenade explosions no longer leave a damaging cloud behind.

Misc.ToolTip: The number of extra shots provided to a Holy Slingshot running Higher Power.
